column3: This is very convenient localisation near many bus lines, and walking distance to tram line.  Surprisingly little noise from the street
column4: WIFI is not easy to access.  Rooms are quite old.

column3: Distance to airport, allows late night check in.
column4: Dirty, falling apart, exposed and non functional outlets, worse than a motel.

column3: The staff was nice and friendly, the rooms were clean, breakfast was ok.
column4: The whole property SCREAMS for renovation, everything is a bit TIRED there.

column3: wi fi was fine, staff was very cooperative
Breakfast was very good - excellent coffee especially,
Nice clean room witch extra bed and pillows
column4: Too cold no thermostat in the room either

column3: Hotel is outside the Brussels and will take atleast 20-25 minutes by taxi to get to city
